wexpman.presentationlayer.view.renderers

Class HtmlDataScrollerRendererFixedForAjax

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.faces.render.Renderer
      • org.apache.myfaces.shared_tomahawk.renderkit.html.HtmlRenderer
        • wexpman.presentationlayer.view.renderers.HtmlDataScrollerRendererFixedForAjax

  • public class HtmlDataScrollerRendererFixedForAjax
extends org.apache.myfaces.shared_tomahawk.renderkit.html.HtmlRenderer
    Renderer for the HtmlDataScroller component. Note by Matias: This is a bug fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TOMAHAWK-768 (patch in that page) which actually also fixes https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TOMAHAWK-596 and its duplicate https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/TOMAHAWK-657 There is more info at http://marc.info/?l=myfaces-user&m=116237031123948&w=2 Basically this will allow for the dataScroller from Tomahawk to be used in portlets without getting duplicate id exceptions when pressing links and also to work with the dataScroller in combination with ajax4jsf.
    Version:
    $Revision: 382051 $ $Date: 2006-03-01 08:25:41 -0700 (Wed, 01 Mar 2006) $
    Author:
    Thomas Spiegl (latest modification by $Author: schof $)
